goal: Add special validation handling for system-snapshot taskType manifests
description: Add _should_skip_behavioral_validation() and _should_skip_implementation_validation() helper functions to skip validation for system-snapshot manifests, since they aggregate multiple files and have no single implementation to validate. System snapshots only undergo schema validation and systemArtifacts structure validation (already done in task-047). This allows 'maid validate system.manifest.json' to work correctly.

contains.name: _should_skip_behavioral_validation
contains.description: Determine if behavioral validation should be skipped for this manifest

contains.name: _should_skip_implementation_validation
contains.description: Determine if implementation validation should be skipped for this manifest
